response.overview: A middle-class, unconcerned towards his life and unappreciative boy Aditya, after losing his father gets hold of his life. He falls in love with an orphan named Anusha and marries her to give her a well-deserving life. The story of Rascal movie revolves around Aditya's ideology of providing love to the people who have been deprived of the love of family their whole lives.
response.title: Rascal
